name: Diablo II Graphics File
summary: A DC6 file is a graphics file used by Diablo II, an action role-playing game released in 2000 by Blizzard Entertainment. It stores a graphic in DC6 format, which supports single and multi-frame images and is displayed during gameplay. DC6 files are used for animations and user interface ( UI ) elements, such as inventory items and background panels.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
